title: 24 Hours problem. (Trying to buy some RP)
body:
Hey, i've been trying to buy some RP on this acc but i just can't do it. I get this message every time  (Havn't bought RP for 4 days now, i get this message every day. And i didn't try buy some for 2 days to try to get off this problem but it's still on.)

 "ERROR: You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts at this time. Please wait 24 hours and try again later."

Could you guys please help me out? I really want to open some project capsules before they go off from the store, 

Thank you,

Max

replies.body:
Usually, when you see those 24-hour warning messages, you need to wait that time period because too many requests had been sent during that time. Trying before then only makes it take longer. 

Since you said you'd already waited 48 hours, that's a little troubling. Make sure you've double checked your payment info juuuuust to make sure it's still 100% correct, and you may need to try refreshing your client to know you've got a solid connection with those servers. If nothing is helping still, reach out to our billing experts in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
The ticket does nothing lmao i have the same problem and i just wanted to buy a gift for my brother for the holidays and the 24 hours error appear -_-
